settings.promo_text: JAMES IS PROUD TO WELCOME HELENE BLANCHE TEXTILES AND WALLPAPERS TO OUR TEXAS SHOWROOMS!

settings.title: Title
settings.content: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: The Showroom
settings.text: Our showrooms are filled to the brim with the finest artisanal textiles, wallpapers, lighting and more. We offer locations in the Dallas Design Center, the Decorative Center of Houston, plus our Austin Resource Library where trade clients can schedule meetings with our knowledgeable rep to view all our lines. Â We look forward to your visit and to helping you with all your sourcing needs!

settings.title: Shop Furniture
settings.text: JAMES proudly represents theÂ entire collection of Bunny Williams Home, Peter Dunham Home Outdoor Furniture, plus a small selection of custom pieces designed by Meredith Ellis. Â

settings.richtext_top: A column with no settings can be used as a spacer
Link to your collections, sales and even external links

settings.sort_a: Alamwar, Anna Spiro, Botanica Trading, Caitlin McGauley, Carolina Irving, Casa Branca, Ferrick Mason, Heather Chadduck, Jennifer Shorto, John Robshaw, Kathryn Ireland, Lake August, Leah O'Connell, Lisa Fine, Mally Skok, Martyn Lawrence Bullard,  McLaurin & Piercy, Nile And York, Otis Textiles, Penny Morrison, Peter Dunham, Pintura Studio, Rebecca Atwood, Rule of Three, Sarah & Ruby, Schuyler Samperton, Serena Dugan, Sister Parish, Studio Four NYC, Tulu Textiles, Walter G
Black, Blue, Green, Gray, Lavender, Multi, Pink, Purple, Red, White, Yellow, Taupe
Cotton, Leather, Linen, Linen/Cotton, Outdoor, Performance, Silk, Woven, Clay Coated Paper, Grasscloth, Paperweave
Floral, Geometric, Marbleized, Solid, Ikat, Animal Print, Abstract, Small Print, Large Repeat, Border, Woven, Block Print, Stripe, Check, Plaid, Paisley
Chandelier, Flush Mount , Semi-Flush Mount, Pendant, Lantern, Wall Light, Sconce, Picture Light, Standing Lamp, Table Lamp, Cordless

settings.title: JAMES - Dallas
settings.text:
Dallas Design Center

1025 N. Stemmons Fwy. #250

Dallas, TX 75207

(214) 295-7500

dallas@jamesshowroom.com

settings.title: JAMES - Houston
settings.text:
Decorative Center of Houston

5120 Woodway Drive #3029

Houston, TX 77056

(713) 955-1053

houston@jamesshowroom.com

settings.title: Austin
settings.text: Our Austin rep is available for designer appointments only. We invite our retail clients to visit or contact our Dallas or Houston showrooms. Designers who would like to schedule an appointment can do so HERE.

settings.subtitle: An inside look at our store, the collections and stories that inspire us.

settings.contact_subheading: Questions about one of our lines? Want to set an appointment? Connect with us.

settings.button_label: VIEW ALL OF OUR FABRIC LINES

settings.title: Can anyone visit your showroom?
settings.subtitle: Absolutely! Â WeÂ hope everyone will have a chance to visit and be inspired by our amazing collection of vendors. Â The Dallas and Houston showrooms are open 9am â€“ 5pm, Monday through Friday. Â TheÂ Austin location is a by appointment only TradeÂ Resource Library for designers to schedule meetings. Â

settings.title: Where are you located?
settings.subtitle:
Our Dallas Showroom is located in the Dallas Design Center at 1025 N. Stemmons Fwy #210, adjacent to CODARUS.  

Our new Houston Showroom is located on the Third Floor of the Decorative Center of Houston at 5120 Woodway, Suite #3029

The Austin location is a  By-Appointment Trade Resource Library for interior designers located at  1411 West 6th Street Unit B.   Parking is available on Oakland Ave. (turn left on Oakland just before you reach the showroom),

settings.title: How do I open a trade account?
settings.subtitle: Simple! Â Please fill out the trade application on our website or email Â the showroom and we. will send you the appropriate form to fill out and return to us. Â You will need toÂ include a copy of your tax permit, a business card, or other identifying business information. Â If you requireÂ immediate assistance, please reach out to us at either houston@jamesshowroom.comÂ orÂ dallas@jamesshowroom.comÂ and weÂ will be happy to help!

settings.title: How can I get a price quote?
settings.subtitle: We ask that designers contact the showroomÂ directly for anyÂ fabric, wallpaper, lighting, furniture, or carpetÂ quotes before submitting a proposal to their clients. For our trade clients with a verified login, we now offer online pricing for reference only. We are not liable for any prices presented to clients that were not part of a formal quote from our showroom sales team. Prices are subject to change and the website may not reflect accurate pricing.

settings.title: Do you meet with designers outside of Dallas or Houston?
settings.subtitle: Yes!Â We regularly meet with designers all over Texas and beyond. Â If you are unable to visit our showrooms in Dallas or Houston and would like to view the lines we represent, please email or callÂ the showroom to set up your trade account. Â We will add your name to our roster and notify you of upcoming dates when JAMES Showroom will be in your area.

settings.title: How can I get samples?
settings.subtitle: If you have established your trade account with JAMES, we now offer online sample ordering for 15 memos or less. Â You must have a verified login for your wholesale account to access this feature. All orders will be matched to the correct account before shipping. Â If the design you require is not available online, simply contact our showroom nearest you for all yourÂ fabric, wallpaper and carpet sample needs. Â If you have not yet set up an account, we ask that you fill out the necessary paperworkÂ when you submit your first request. Â If you are not a designer, please email us at houston@jamesshowroom.comÂ with your request. Â You will be asked to fill out a Credit Card Authorization form in the event the samples are not returned withinÂ the specified time. ($10 per sample).

settings.title: Can I purchase your products if Iâ€™m not a designer?
settings.subtitle: We offer a wide variety of curated fabrics, wallpapers, lighting, furniture, carpets, art, and accessories for our retail clients. Custom options and online sample ordering are reserved for trade clients only.

settings.title: HOW DO I SUBMIT MY LINE FOR REPRESENTATION?
settings.subtitle: If you you would like to submit your line for representation,Â please visit the Vendor ApplicationÂ page for more information and the application.

settings.title: Do you stock your fabrics and wallpaper?
settings.subtitle: We do not stock yardage of any fabrics or wallpaper in our showroom. Some of the lines we represent stock some of their goods while others are made to order, meaning the vendor does not print or weave the product until payment has been received and the order has been placed. If you have a tight deadline we can make recommendations, and check with our vendors to see if they have anything available that fits your needs.  Express shipping is available for most of our vendors.

settings.title: What is the minimum order for fabrics and wallpaper?
settings.subtitle: The minimum order requirements for fabric and wallpaper vary depending on the vendor.

settings.title: Will you let me know how much fabric or wallpaper I need?
settings.subtitle: Unfortunately we cannot offer wallpaper and fabric quantity estimates. It is the client’s responsibility to contact a professional wallpaper hanger or upholsterer for your quantity estimate.

settings.title: Do you offer design services?
settings.subtitle: Unfortunately we do not offer design services, but we are always happy to offer suggestions when time allows!  We love to dream up new schemes!

settings.content: JAMES Showroom offers a highly curated collection of the finest artisanal textiles, wallpapers, lighting, and carpets from around the world. Launched in a historic bungalow near downtown Austin in 2015, JAMES is the passion of nationally-recognized interior designer Meredith Ellis, who brings  over 20 years experience working for top firms in New York and LA.  Meredith always dreamed of creating an inspirational sourcing environment for designers, so JAMES was born  to help fuel the rapidly growing design industry in Texas.

settings.contact_content:
Thank you for your interest in being represented by JAMES!  As a boutique showroom, space is a huge consideration.  If you would like to submit samples for review, please send to:

JAMES Showroom

Attn: New Submission

1025 N. Stemmons Fwy #250

Dallas, TX 75207

Please do not expect an immediate response as this is a lengthy process with the goal of identifying the right lines for our curated collection.  We request you also include any information on your process, pricing, stocking, etc that will help us make our decision.  If you would like the samples returned, please include a return shipping label.  Please do not call the showroom to inquire about representation.  We ask that you use the contact form on this page if you have any questions. Thank you!

settings.title: SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT
settings.subtitle: showroom visit or zoom meetingÂ
